item.title: 英伟达首席执行官准备公布与三星和现代汽车的人工智能协议
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）老板黄仁勋计划在本周访问韩国时，公布向三星电子公司和现代汽车集团等韩国大公司供应人工智能芯片的新合同，为其业务开拓新机遇。【原文：Nvidia Corp. boss Jensen Huang plans to unveil new contracts to supply AI chips to major South Korean companies, including Samsung Electronics Co. and Hyundai Motor Group, when he visits the country this week to carve out new opportunities for his business.】

item.title: Brightline 赢得 9.85 亿美元通勤债券谈判延期
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，周二，在债券持有人允许该公司延长相关交易谈判的最后期限后，在迈阿密和奥兰多之间运营 235 英里私营铁路的 Brightline 公司将不会被迫回购 9.85 亿美元的市政债务。【原文：Brightline, which runs a 235-mile private railroad between Miami and Orlando, won’t be forced to buy back $985 million of municipal debt Tuesday after bondholders granted the company a deadline extension on related deal talks, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 斯洛伐克总理称赞中国电动汽车电池厂与欧盟决裂
item.description: 斯洛伐克总理罗伯特-菲佐（Robert Fico）对中国国轩高科有限公司（Gotion High-Tech Co.【原文：Slovak Prime Minister Robert Fico hailed a decision by China’s Gotion High-Tech Co. to build a €1.2 billion ($1.4 billion) electric-car battery plant in his country even as ties between Beijing and the European Union grow increasingly tense.】

item.title: 瑞士保险公司 Youplus 停止新业务，寻求新资本
item.description: Youplus 集团正在寻求新的支持者，因为衡量其财务实力的一个关键指标骤降到了自我设定的目标以下。【原文：Youplus Group is seeking new backers after one of its key measures of financial strength plunged below a self-imposed target.】

item.title: 阿波罗的克莱因曼预计 PE 交易将继续放缓步伐
item.description: 美联储的降息预期为期待已久的交易卷土重来带来了希望，但阿波罗全球管理公司的斯科特-克莱因曼（Scott Kleinman）预计，未来几年私募股权公司出售资产的速度将继续放缓。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s expected rate cuts are fueling hopes of a long-awaited deal comeback, but Apollo Global Management Inc.’s Scott Kleinman anticipates that private equity firms will keep selling their assets at a slower pace for the next few years.】

item.title: 波士顿私立大学信用评级被穆迪降至垃圾级
item.description: 波士顿的一所私立大学采取了一项不同寻常的策略，试图扭转财务紧张的局面：削减本科生人数。【原文：A private university in Boston has taken an unusual strategy in an attempt to right its stressed finances: cutting the number of undergraduate students.】

item.title: SoFi 首席执行官称超越借贷助推本季度业绩创纪录
item.description: SoFi Technologies Inc.首席执行官安东尼-诺托（Anthony Noto）表示，SoFi Technologies Inc.在贷款以外的客户服务领域的扩张正在盈利中显现，帮助推动第三季度业绩创下新高。【原文：SoFi Technologies Inc. is seeing its expansion in customer services beyond lending showing up in earnings, helping drive record results in the third quarter, Chief Executive Officer Anthony Noto said.】

item.title: 据说 Medline 最快将于周二公开申请在美国上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Medline 公司最快将于本周二公开申请首次公开募股，这可能是 2025 年美国最大的一次上市。【原文：Medline is set to file publicly for an initial public offering as soon as Tuesday, according to people familiar with the matter, in what could be the biggest US listing of 2025.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦掀起 AT1 热潮，ForteBank 获得 10 亿美元投标
item.description: 哈萨克斯坦的一家银行是由几家有违约历史的当地贷款机构合并而成的，它是最新一家筹集高风险银行资本的借款人。【原文：A Kazakh bank created through the merger of several local lenders with a history of defaults is the latest borrower to raise a high-risk form of bank capital.】

item.title: 瑞银称卡特彼勒将从数据中心繁荣中获得利润增长
item.description: 据瑞银集团（UBS）称，重型机械制造商卡特彼勒公司（Caterpillar Inc.）和康明斯公司（Cummins Inc.【原文：Heavy machinery makers Caterpillar Inc. and Cummins Inc. will get a “meaningful” boost to earnings in the next three years as revenue nearly doubles from selling backup generators to help power US data centers, according to UBS.】

item.title: 特斯拉董事长称马斯克薪酬方案能否获批尚不清楚
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc. ）董事长表示，就在投资者进行关键投票的前几天，要知道为首席执行官埃隆-马斯克的巨额薪酬方案赢得股东支持的活动是否会取得成功还为时尚早。【原文：Tesla Inc.’s chair said it’s too early to know whether a campaign to win shareholder support for Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk’s enormous pay package will be successful just days ahead of a pivotal vote by investors.】

item.title: 英伟达将向诺基亚投资 10 亿美元，推动人工智能网络发展
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）计划向诺基亚公司（Nokia Oyj）进行 10 亿美元的股权投资，作为人工智能领域的王者，英伟达押注于这家芬兰公司从移动网络套件向人工智能领域的转型。【原文：Nvidia Corp. plans to make a $1 billion equity investment in Nokia Oyj, as the AI sector’s kingmaker bets on the Finnish company’s pivot from mobile networking kit into artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 世界银行称巴基斯坦增长太慢，无法提高生活水平
item.description: 据世界银行称，巴基斯坦的经济增长过于缓慢，无法切实提高生活水平，也无法为不断增长的人口创造足够的就业机会。【原文：Pakistan’s economy is expanding too slowly to meaningfully improve living standards or create enough jobs for its growing population, according to the World Bank.】

item.title: 随着利润和经济复苏，尼日利亚企业有望修复资产负债表
item.description: 在经历了 2024 年的挫折之后，尼日利亚的公司将利用重新获得的利润重建资产负债表并促进增长。【原文：Nigeria’s companies are set to use their renewed profits to rebuild their balance sheets and fuel growth after a bruising 2024.】

item.title: Adler Pelzer 债务上升，部分持有者将做空者拒之门外
item.description: Adler Pelzer Holding GmbH 公司债券的投资者正在阻止试图从债券下跌中获利的做空者，从而推高了债券价格。【原文：Investors in Adler Pelzer Holding GmbH’s bonds are freezing out short sellers seeking to profit from their decline, driving up the price of the notes.】

item.title: 投资者确信瓦塔拉在民调中获胜，象牙海岸债券上涨
item.description: 科特迪瓦总统阿拉萨内-瓦塔拉（Alassane Ouattara）在周六的大选中获胜后，乐观地认为他将继续在这个世界头号可可生产国推行有利于商业的政策，因此科特迪瓦美元债券上涨。【原文：Ivory Coast dollar bonds gained on optimism President Alassane Ouattara will continue to deliver business-friendly policies in the world’s top cocoa producer after winning Saturday’s elections.】

item.title: 美国和韩国将签署促进人工智能和量子合作的协议
item.description: 据一位美国官员透露，唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府将与韩国签署一项协议，旨在加强在人工智能、量子计算和 6G 领域的合作。【原文：President Donald Trump’s administration is slated to sign a deal with South Korea aimed at bolstering cooperation in artificial intelligence, quantum computing and 6G, according to a US official — part of a bid to maintain a competitive edge with China in an expanding race for tech supremacy.】

item.title: 飞利浦收到美国 FDA 关于设备设施的警告信
item.description: 荷兰皇家飞利浦公司收到美国食品和药物管理局的一封警告信，称其三个生产基地不符合标准，这对飞利浦公司为消除其部分产品备受关注的问题所做的努力是一个打击。【原文：Royal Philips NV received a letter from the US Food and Drug Administration warning that three manufacturing sites don’t meet standards, a blow to efforts to draw a line under high-profile issues with some of its products.】

item.title: GlobalFoundries 首席执行官称客户要求本地芯片供应
item.description: GlobalFoundries Inc.首席执行官蒂姆-布林（Tim Breen）说，这家总部位于美国的公司在德国的扩张计划旨在满足客户日益增长的需求，客户希望保证他们的半导体供应独立于中国大陆和台湾。【原文：GlobalFoundries Inc. Chief Executive Officer Tim Breen said that the US-based company’s expansion plans in Germany are aimed at meeting increasing demands from clients, who want assurances that their supply of semiconductors is independent from China and Taiwan.】

item.title: 尽管美国证券交易委员会（SEC）关闭，新加密货币交易所交易基金仍在拥挤的人群中推出
item.description: 本周，一系列专注于小型加密货币的交易所交易基金将在华尔街首次亮相，发行商将在政府持续停摆的情况下继续上市。【原文：A slew of exchange-traded funds focused on smaller cryptocurrencies are making their Wall Street debut this week, with issuers going ahead with the listings amid the ongoing government shutdown.】

item.title: 美国消费者信心因经济和就业市场前景而下滑
item.description: 由于对经济和劳动力市场前景的看法趋于暗淡，10月份美国消费者信心连续第三个月下降。【原文：US consumer confidence fell in October for a third straight month on dimmer views about the outlook for the economy and labor market.】

item.title: Blackstone 与沙特人工智能公司 Humain 签订 30 亿美元数据中心交易协议
item.description: 私募股权投资巨头 Blackstone Inc. 正与沙特阿拉伯新成立的人工智能公司 Humain 合作，在沙特阿拉伯王国建设数据中心，初期投资约 30 亿美元。【原文：Private equity giant Blackstone Inc. is partnering with Saudi Arabia’s new artificial intelligence company, Humain, to build data centers in the kingdom with an initial investment of about $3 billion.】

item.title: 苹果公司成为历史上第三只市值突破 4 万亿美元的股票
item.description: 苹果公司股价上涨 0.4%，市值达到 4 万亿美元，使这家 iPhone 制造商成为历史上第三家达到这一里程碑的上市公司。【原文：Apple Inc. shares rose as much 0.4% to hit $4 trillion in market value, making the iPhone maker only the third public company in history to reach the milestone.】

item.title: 中国以大豆为支点限制了美国贸易新政的收益
item.description: 当美国和中国在 2020 年解决了之前的贸易战时，美国大豆生产商的出口量激增到接近创纪录的水平。这一次，任何协议的回报都可能小得多。【原文：When the US and China settled their earlier trade war in 2020, American soybean producers saw their exports surge to near record levels. This time around, any deal is likely to yield far smaller rewards.】

item.title: S&P 500 指数上涨，交易员等待财报展示和降息消息
item.description: 周二，美国股市继续上扬，因为华尔街正在等待所谓的 "七大公司 "中的一些公司本周公布财报，美联储也开始了为期两天的会议。【原文：US stocks extended their advance Tuesday as Wall Street awaited a roll out of financial results from some of the so-called Magnificent Seven companies this week and the Federal Reserve commenced its two-day meeting.】

item.title: 俄罗斯原油流量走低，但还不能归咎于制裁
item.description:
波罗的海主要港口的大风可能阻碍了上周的装货作业

。【原文：

High winds at key Baltic port likely hampered loading operations last week

】

item.title: OpenAI 敲定营利计划，微软获 27% 股份
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp.）和 OpenAI 在长期谈判的合作伙伴关系中敲定了一项新协议，为两家公司的投资者消除了一层不确定性，并为 ChatGPT 制造商重组为营利性企业铺平了道路。【原文：Microsoft Corp. and OpenAI finalized a new agreement in a long-negotiated partnership, removing a layer of uncertainty for both companies’ investors and paving the way for the ChatGPT maker to restructure as a for-profit business.】

item.title: ERG 正在酝酿对巴西巴明铁矿石项目的收购要约
item.description: 欧亚资源集团正在与三家对其巴西铁矿石项目感兴趣的投资者进行谈判。【原文：Eurasian Resources Group is in talks with three different investors interested in its Brazilian iron ore project Bahia Mineração.】

item.title: 国会如何解决美国农民工短缺问题
item.description:
由于特朗普政府将移民执法作为优先事项，来自农业区的代表们表示，他们需要一个创造性的解决方案来快速解决他们的劳动力问题。【原文：

As the Trump administration prioritizes immigration enforcement, representatives from farming districts say they need a creative solution to their labor problems, and fast.

】

item.title: 美国房价创两年多来最弱涨幅
item.description: 由于购房者在谈判中增加了筹码，且库存增加，8 月份房价涨幅为两年多来最小，连续第七个月放缓。【原文：Home prices gained the least in over two years, slowing for the seventh straight month in August as buyers gained leverage in negotiations and inventory grew.】
